text: Kakke Kakke Koodevide is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. Rajasekharan, starring Vijayaraghavan and Geethu Mohandas in the lead roles. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/film_kakke-kakke-koodevide.htm ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar * Kalpana * Vishnu as Nandhu * Ashwin Thampi * Geethu Mohandas * M. S. Thrippoonithura * Vijayaraghavan * Lakshmi Krishnamoorthy ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kakke Kakke Koodevide
